content:
Booking a character dining experience at Cape May Cafe is a fantastic way to start your Disney World adventure!

**Advance Reservations:**
I highly recommend booking a character dining experience at Cape May Cafe in advance. Character dining experiences are very popular, and tables can fill up quickly, especially during peak seasons like Thanksgiving. If you don't book in advance, you might not get a table at your preferred time or even at all.

You can make reservations for Cape May Cafe up to 180 days in advance by:

1. Visiting the My Disney Experience website or mobile app
2. Calling (407) WDW-DINE (939-3463)
3. Using the Disney Dining Reservation Finder tool on the Disney website

**Why Book in Advance:**

1. **Guaranteed Table:** By booking in advance, you'll have a guaranteed table at your preferred time.
2. **Preferred Seating:** You can request a specific time and seating area, such as a window seat or a table near the character meet-and-greet area.
3. **Less Waiting:** With a reservation, you'll have a shorter wait time, if any, compared to walk-up guests.
4. **Peace of Mind:** You can plan your day around your character dining experience, knowing that you have a confirmed reservation.

**Walk-up Availability:**
While it's possible to show up without a reservation, you might face the following issues:

1. **Long Wait Times:** You might have to wait for an extended period, possibly up to an hour or more, for a table to become available.
2. **Limited Availability:** You might not get a table at all, especially during peak seasons.
3. **Unpredictable Character Appearances:** Without a reservation, you can't guarantee which characters will be present during your visit.

To ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience, I recommend booking your character dining experience at Cape May Cafe in advance.

Do you have any other questions about character dining or Cape May Cafe?
